channel.title: CVE Feed for Amssplus -- AMSS++
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Amssplus -- AMSS++

item.title: CVE-2024-2586|2024-03-18T13:54:58.131Z -- amssplus -- amss%2B%2B
item.description: Vulnerability in AMSS++ version 4.31 that allows SQL injection through /amssplus/index.php, in the 'username' parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in the DB.
